Bethlehem.Newburg, Northampton County, Pennsylvani: Newburg is a village located in Lower Nazareth Township, Northampton County, Pennsylvania, at the eastern terminus of Route 946 upon Route 191. It is served by the Nazareth Area School District. It is split between the Bethlehem zip codes of 18017 and 18020 and the Easton zip code of 18045.
